name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Seasoned Senior Ruby Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering robust backend systems. Proficient in leveraging **AWS**, **Docker**, and **Ruby** to create scalable, high-performance applications tailored to financial platforms and beyond. Proven skills in developing APIs and automation tools, with expertise in integrating **JavaScript** and utilizing configuration management tools like **Chef**. Possesses a solid foundation in analytics with knowledge of **SAS** and **R**, and has successfully contributed to major projects for prominent organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered backend services in **Ruby** to streamline document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Developed containerized solutions using **Docker** for efficient deployment and environments management across multiple projects.
Utilized **Ruby on Rails** and associated frameworks to enhance system functionality and improve user experience for financial transaction requests.
Collaborated with DevOps teams to deploy applications on **AWS** infrastructure, ensuring robust, scalable, and secure environments.
Implemented automated deployment strategies using **Chef** and CI/CD pipelines to foster rapid and reliable release cycles, achieving deployment times reduced by **30%**.
Created and maintained data analytics reports using **SAS** and **R**, improving decision-making processes by providing accurate insights based on collected data.
Led security assessments to enhance system integrity, implementing best practices and frameworks for compliant and secure applications.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensuring compliance, and overseeing release strategies.

Utilized **AWS** to optimize cloud-based solutions and enhance system performance for backend development in Ruby.
Developed scalable applications using **Docker** to create reproducible build environments, achieving a **50%** faster deployment time.
Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines using **Chef**, ensuring consistent integration and delivery of new features with a **30%** reduction in rollout errors.
Leveraged **JavaScript** for implementing dynamic user interfaces, improving user engagement metrics by **15%** through interactive elements.
Conducted thorough code reviews and debugging sessions, optimizing existing Ruby codebases and achieving a **20%** reduction in technical debt.
Advanced collaboration with cross-functional teams to ensure high-quality deliverables and timely product launches, meeting over **90%** of project deadlines.
Trained junior engineers in best practices for Ruby development and cloud service integrations, fostering team growth and skill development.

• Developed backend services leveraging **Ruby** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, enhancing trading operations and boosting transaction efficiency by **30%**.
• Engineered robust APIs using **JavaScript** and **WebSocket** protocols to facilitate real-time data interactions, ensuring seamless communication across platforms.

• Ensured compliance with regulatory standards such as MiFID II and GDPR, maintaining data security through the use of **Chef** for configuration management.
• Implemented CI/CD processes with tools like **SAS** and **MS 365**, driving rapid release cycles and enhancing collaboration amongst development teams.
• Automated reporting and data analysis workflows using **R**, facilitating better decision-making through data-driven insights within the trading platform.
